com.sillysoft.vox
Class UnitStack

java.lang.Object
  com.sillysoft.vox.UnitStack
All Implemented Interfaces:
XMLSerializable
public class UnitStack
extends java.lang.Object
implements XMLSerializable

Each UnitStack represents a number of units sharing a type and owner.
